info.title: Your pet API
info.description: This API of the Your Pet application. It is built on Node.js, utilizing the Express.js framework to implement the API and Mongoose for interacting with the MongoDB database.

title.example: What I Learned Dogsitting for New York Citys Opulent Elite

text.example: In a city of yawning class inequality, some side hustles let you glimpse how the other half lives.

example.title: The Virtual Vet Will See You Meow
example.text: Veterinary telemedicine could help more pet owners access much-needed care and put anxious animals at ease, but challenges remain.
